name: Fight for Light (SakurinHatake)
description:
In Fight for Light, you have to go through some levels to get rid of the enemies that have invaded the sky. There won't be any power-ups, but you may regen your life and increase it as well as your attack by slashing a special type of character.

...

This game has been made as a personal project for my university's autumn semester course, in 2022.

I have made everything, except the font. For the background music, the main melody is from LiSA's Akeboshi.

There are 2 endings
